Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 80th overall pick, by Capital City in 1976...
Injured on 6/20/1979 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 9 weeks...
Released by Capital City on 5/5/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 2/1/1982 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Injured on 6/4/1982 with a Bruised Foot, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/2/1984 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/16/1986, off Aaron Fresquez (CC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1986, off Thomas North (LYN)...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (UBA) on 9/20/1987...
